title: Attack on Titan
summary: Humanity lives inside cities surrounded by enormous walls due to the Titans, gigantic humanoid beings who devour humans seemingly without reason.

title: Gintama
summary: Three freelancers who search for work in order to pay the monthly rent, which usually goes unpaid anyway.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
summary: Set in a universe where alchemy is a widely practiced science, two alchemist brothers are searching for a way to restore their bodies after a failed experiment.

title: Steins;Gate
summary: A self-proclaimed mad scientist invents a microwave that can send text messages into the past.

title: Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
summary: Lelouch Lamperouge finds himself caught in a crossfire between the Britannian and the Area 11 rebel armed forces.

title: Mushishi
summary: What are Mushi and why do they exist? Mushishi are those who research Mushi in hopes of understanding their place in the world's hierarchy of life.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
summary: High school student Yuji Itadori as he joins a secret organization of Jujutsu Sorcerers in order to kill a powerful Curse.

title: Death Note
summary: Light Yagami discovers a mysterious notebook which grants the user the ability to kill anyone whose name is written in its pages.

title: One Punch Man
summary: Saitama performs heroic deeds as a hobby. He has trained himself to the point of being able to defeat any enemy with a single punch, but his unmatched strength has left him with an overwhelming sense of boredom.

title: One Piece
summary: Monkey D. Luffy explores the Grand Line in search of the world's ultimate treasure known as One Piece in order to become the next Pirate King.
